en: God responds to deception and rebellion with judgement.
This passage shows the consequences placed on the serpent and the beginning of conflict between good and evil.

lines: So the Lord God said to the serpent,
cursed are you above all the livestock
You will crawl on your belly
all the days of your life.”
and between your offspring and hers;
and you will strike his heel.”

question.en: What do you notice about the way God describes judgement and ongoing conflict in this passage?
